title: Dragonlance: Anthologies (2016 remake)
description:
New handcrafted versions of the beloved Dragonlance series.
Many of these books have no proper digital editions, and the fan-made versions have been of varying quality.
The end goal is to have the entire Dragonlance novel series lifted into the digital age with good quality editions.

Project status: 7 books left to verify until first release of the entire saga.

Please support the authors!

Enjoy these releases? Leave a comment or rate the torrent as good.

The books have been cleaned up, and hundreds, if not thousands, of changes have been performed:
 * Stripped away the digital vandalism done by Calibre-exports and editing tools
 * Added custom css
 * Added proper font
 * Added proper cover scans
 * Removed all inline formatting
 * Layout, paragraphs and text formatting verified against printed version
 * Spellchecked
 * Validated with FlightCrew
 
A note about quality:
v1.x: Scanned and OCR-ed. Missing spell-checking and proofreading. Poorly formatted after scanning, epub non-compliant, missing toc and proper chapters & paragraphs.
v2.x: Decently formatted and epub compliant, usually missing toc and validated chapters & paragraphs.
v3.x: Spellchecked, well formatted with attempted chapter & paragraph cleanup, including toc. Passes FlightCrew validation.  
v4.x: Proofread, visually checked chapters and paragraphs vs source material. Near retail quality. 
v5.x: Publication is of retail quality and proofread/validated by multiple persons.
retail-: Retail versions that have been vandalized by Calibre export. Restoration may have been attempted.
retail: Untouched retail versions
